20110119020006.000|20110119020008.000|CC1|THAT THE GUNSHOT ITSELF WAS

20110119020010.000|20110119020012.000|CC1|CLASSROOM FOUR, BUILDING A ON   
20110119020012.000|20110119020015.000|CC1|THE GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL CAMPUS.

20110119020017.000|20110119020018.000|CC1|GUNFIRE.

20110119020018.000|20110119020020.000|CC1|THE HEAD, AND THE GIRL FELL.    
20110119020020.000|20110119020022.000|CC1|EVERYBODY STARTED SCREAMING.

20110119020024.000|20110119020026.000|CC1|WAS THE ONE THAT CALLED THE 911.
20110119020026.000|20110119020027.000|CC1|>> Reporter: INVESTIGATORS SAY A
20110119020027.000|20110119020029.000|CC1|17-YEAR-OLD MALE STUDENT HAD    
20110119020029.000|20110119020031.000|CC1|DROPPED HIS BACKPACK ON A DESK  
20110119020031.000|20110119020035.000|CC1|INSIDE A BERETTA .9-MILLIMETER  
20110119020035.000|20110119020036.000|CC1|SEMIAUTOMATIC HAND GUN WHICH    
20110119020036.000|20110119020037.000|CC1|DISCHARGED.

20110119020042.000|20110119020042.000|CC1|15-YEAR-OLD GIRL.

20110119020045.000|20110119020046.000|CC1|UCLA MEDICAL CENTER.

20110119020051.000|20110119020052.000|CC1|QUICKLY PUT THE SCHOOL IN       
20110119020052.000|20110119020052.000|CC1|LOCKDOWN.

20110119020208.000|20110119020209.000|CC1|SHOOTING.
